testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what coffee lovers have to say about their Brew Haven experience.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.content: The best coffee in town! I come here every morning before work. The atmosphere is cozy and the baristas remember my usual order.

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.content: My favorite place to work remotely. Fast WiFi, great coffee, and the perfect ambient noise level. The cold brew is my go-to.

reviews.name: Emily Rodriguez
reviews.content: As a coffee connoisseur, I can confidently say Brew Haven serves some of the most expertly crafted espresso in the city.

aboutSection.title: Our Story
aboutSection.description1: Founded in 2010, Brew Haven began as a small cart in the local farmers market. Our passion for exceptional coffee and community connection quickly earned us a loyal following.
aboutSection.description2: Today, we source our beans directly from sustainable farms around the world, roast them in small batches, and serve them with care and expertise. Every cup represents our commitment to quality and our love for the craft.
